com.hazelcast.spi

Interface BlockingOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackupAwareMultiMapOperation, AcquireOperation, AwaitMapFlushOperation, AwaitOperation, AwaitOperation, BasePutOperation, BaseRemoveOperation, CacheEventJournalReadOperation, ContainsEntryOperation, ContainsKeyOperation, CountOperation, DeleteOperation, DeleteOperation, EntryOperation, EventJournalReadOperation, EvictOperation, GetAllOperation, GetEntryViewOperation, GetOperation, GetResultOperation, LegacyMergeOperation, LockAwareOperation, LockOperation, MapEventJournalReadOperation, OfferOperation, PollOperation, PutIfAbsentOperation, PutOperation, PutOperation, PutTransientOperation, ReadManyOperation, ReadOneOperation, RemoveAllOperation, RemoveIfSameOperation, RemoveOperation, RemoveOperation, ReplaceIfSameOperation, ReplaceOperation, RetrieveAndDisposeResultOperation, RetrieveResultOperation, SetOperation, SetTtlOperation, TryPutOperation, TryRemoveOperation, TxnCommitOperation, TxnDeleteOperation, TxnLockAndGetOperation, TxnLockAndGetOperation, TxnPeekOperation, TxnPrepareOperation, TxnReserveOfferOperation, TxnReservePollOperation, TxnRollbackOperation, TxnSetOperation, TxnUnlockOperation

    public interface BlockingOperation
    An interface that can be implemented by an operation that can block. For example an ILock.acquire.
